price: (A ce masa): "Wancan azaba sabõda abin da hannayenka biyu suka gabatar ne, kuma lalle ne Allah bai zama Mai zãlunci ga bãyinSa ba."
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
